categories: SH/FT Mid Breeze Light Trail Shoes
description: Urban style, built for the trail. The SH/FT blurs the line between casual and technical footwear, with grippy rubber lugs and eye catching colour-blocking, it's just at home in the streets as the backcountry. The unique midsole has high energy return, similar to a running shoe, that puts a spring in your step when on the trail.Stretch-knit synthetic bootie provides a sock-like fit and leather overlays add durability.Midsole is PU foam embedded with squishy beads for durable comfort and energy return.Omni-Grip non-marking rubber sole provides traction on the trail.
name: Columbia SH/FT Mid Breeze Light Trail Shoes - Women's
